duties_responsibilities.duty: Help define business processes as they pertain to application and integration workflow.
Troubleshoot and resolve application and integration-related incidents and problems.
Formulate and present solutions to application issues.
Remediate simple application issues and run them through the team’s delivery cycle.
Document incidents and problems with an appropriate level of detail.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. ITIL certification required.
